Articles.Content:
Hi,

I search for delta-v map more accurate/with more info than the ones I found.

I actually use this one : http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/w/images/7/73/KerbinDeltaVMap.png

It look nice, but I think that it miss some info like planets gravity (ex: kerbin 1g, Mun 0.166g), time low orbit to moon (ex: low Jool orbit to Laynth intercept), solar panel effyicency (with kerbin referencial to 1 (?)).

Maybe some other info, feel free to post if you find others.

I use these informations to desing my spaces ships and all ressources needed for my missions (electicity, life support, delta-v, ...) (I use BTSM mod, but I think this map can be usefull for vanilla too).

That is all for the data part, now we can talk about the graphic part.

I think we can find, in ksp community, some guys/girls with desing/drawing skills.

So I want a map good-looking, like a poster, or at least which can be fix at the wall.

Maybe this map already exist, if you have one, please shart it !

If you have any questions, suggestions or comments feel free to post/mp me.

Thank you !

Oximore

Ps: Sorry for my english, it's not my mother langage. I hope I didn't bleed your eyes

Pps : there are tow threads : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/20993-Request-Delta-V-maps and http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25360-Delta-V-map

but there are quite old and I didn't want to bring them back up.

Ppps : Some others fun ideas : realistic planets, kerbal head in a corner, this one in a other corner or maybe this
